backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with authorization mixin, user profile storage, network and transmission types, signaling list, and profile/network query and save functions.
backend/migration.mo: Adds a migration step that introduces an empty signalMessages list when upgrading from the old actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten short summaries for numerous frontend source files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router, route definitions, authentication gating, and profile setup dialog logic.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout with header, navigation, footer, and authenticated/unauthenticated nav item visibility.
Displays a segmented audio level bar that updates from a hook and shows active/inactive status.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Blocks access until the user is authenticated with Internet Identity, showing a login prompt if not.
frontend/src/components/DirectoryBrowser: Provides searchable, filterable browsing of digital voice networks and talkgroups with favorite toggling.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchConne: Form for configuring and saving IAX/DVSwitch connection settings before navigating to the PTT page.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/NowHearingList.t: Shows recent real‑time transmissions with metadata or a loading/empty state.
frontend/src/components/PersonalDirector: Manages user-defined local directory entries with add, list, and delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog for initial user profile setup including callsign, name, and license acknowledgement.
frontend/src/components/PttControl.tsx: Push-to-talk button component handling press state, visual feedback, and transmit callbacks.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeStatusBa: Displays connection, transmit/receive status, and room label using badges and icons.
frontend/src/components/TransmitDisclaim: Warning alert requiring users to acknowledge a valid radio license with link to settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instances tied to identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioLevelMeter.ts: Tracks microphone audio level in real time using Web Audio API with lifecycle cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and saves the caller’s user profile via the backend actor with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Retrieves and toggles favorite networks using backend actor queries and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, and identity lifecycle management.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicPttRecorder.ts: Implements push-to-talk microphone recording using MediaRecorder with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworks.ts: Fetches builtin networks and performs client-side search filtering via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useNowHearing.ts: Fetches and updates real-time 'now hearing' transmissions with polling support.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferredConnectio: Manages saving, loading, and clearing preferred connection settings with legacy compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrzLookup.ts: Runs a QRZ callsign lookup mutation via the backend if supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Fetches the caller’s user role and admin status from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebRtcPtt.ts: Custom hook managing WebRTC push‑to‑talk logic, including peer connection setup, signaling, audio streams, and state tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme definitions with custom color variables and status utility classes for the app’s dark radio‑style UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutCompliancePage.t: Page explaining PTTStar’s purpose and amateur‑radio licensing/compliance requirements with informational cards and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityPage.tsx: Displays live and recent transmission activity with auto‑updating data and a manual refresh option.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Provides UI for configuring or clearing IAX/DVSwitch connection settings using tabbed forms.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Network directory browser with tabs for browsing networks and managing personal directory entries.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page introducing PTTStar, offering login or navigation to connection settings, features, and compliance info.
frontend/src/pages/PttPage.tsx: Renders the Push-to-Talk screen, manages connection loading, room joining, WebRTC PTT state, mic recording fallback, and UI for transmit/receive/error states.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides user profile editing with callsign, name, and license acknowledgment, plus QRZ lookup and form validation with save and lookup actions.
frontend/src/utils/roomKey.ts: Generates stable room keys and human-readable labels based on stored connection types like IAX/DVSwitch or directory connections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project version, architecture notes, existing features, and overall app purpose for PTTStar.
